general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University. It includes academic and administrative information such as the 2025-26 program, different schools (Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, Nursing Science & Research), examination reports, Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, and university brochures. Additionally, it covers aspects like university perspective, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, relevant acts, COVID-19 information, various skill development and awareness initiatives (language, soft skills, technology trends, entrepreneurship, innovation), FM Radio, guidelines for visa and medical insurance, observership programs, a mentoring portal, and international collaborations/campuses.

career_path.summary: This text outlines career paths available after completing a course, including roles like Interior Design Consultant, Entrepreneur, and Set/Retail Designer. Graduates typically receive an average annual package ranging from 3.20 LPA to 6.00 LPA and are encouraged to pursue a career in architecture and design.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Interior Design Consultant
• Entrepreneurs
• Set/Retail Designers
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.20 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in architecture & design.

course_details.summary: This document outlines a curriculum for an Interior Design program, detailing courses offered across four semesters. Each semester lists courses with their respective codes, names, lecture (L), tutorial (T), practical (P) hours, credits, and category (e.g., CC, DSE, SEC, AEC, OE). Specific semesters have defined minimum and maximum credit requirements. The data also includes repetitive course code and name pairings and a list of courses without detailed breakdown.
